cocktails.name: The 19th Hole
cocktails.description: A refreshing gin-based cocktail perfect for post-round celebrations at the clubhouse.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a shaker
Strain into a tall glass filled with ice
Top with soda water and garnish with mint sprig
cocktails.garnish: Fresh mint sprig and lime wheel

cocktails.name: The Birdie
cocktails.description: A sophisticated bourbon cocktail named after the golf scoring term for one under par.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass
Fill with ice and stir until well-chilled
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

cocktails.name: The Eagle
cocktails.description: A premium cocktail for celebrating exceptional golf shots, featuring aged rum and tropical flavors.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker
Strain into a chilled coupe glass
